content: I am prone to believe that Trump has given alot of power and decision making over to CENTCOM, he really does not get involved in such things. He would not be the first to do so, nor the last. The jaded side of me thinks this would be those wanting to flex muscle and see “big, pretty boom booms.” However, I actually do have higher respect for them than that. I do think they need a counter balance else they can get lost in their own agenda and be corrupted by power.
